headline: McCormick (MKC) Gets Price Target Cut as Stifel Flags Sector-Wide Caution
summary: McCormick & Company Inc. (NYSE:MKC) is one of the best defensive stocks to invest in according to analysts. In its Q2 2025 results report at the end of June, the company highlighted headwinds from tariff costs over FY 2025, which it plans to offset through adjustments in sourcing of materials, pricing, and cost discipline. However, pricing […]
